title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: The All Types dialog in JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (such as a, a1, b, c, d) which should not be displayed.
OB: When opening the All Types dialog, obfuscated classes (such as a, a1, b, c, d) are prominently shown.
EB: Obfuscated classes (such as a, a1, b, c, d) should be displayed with less prominence or excluded from the All Types dialog.
SR: Exclude obfuscated classes (such as a, a1, b, c, d) from the list of classes shown in the All Types dialog.
